Sentencas: Decrease of the operation temperature below 1000 degrees C for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is effective for the actual applications.
Titulo: Characterization of rare earth-doped ceria powders derived from oxalate coprecipitate

Sentencas: Doped ceria, which has a higher oxygen ion conductivity than yttria-stabilized zirconia, is a possible electrolyte for SOFC at a low temperature.
Titulo: Characterization of rare earth-doped ceria powders derived from oxalate coprecipitate

Sentencas: This study was worked for powder preparation and densification of rare earth-doped ceria with a composition of Ce0.8R0.2O1.9 (R=Yb,Y,Gd,Sm,Nd and La).
Titulo: Characterization of rare earth-doped ceria powders derived from oxalate coprecipitate

Sentencas: A mixed rare earth / cerium nitrate solution was added to an oxalic solution to produce the oxalate coprecipitate.
Titulo: Characterization of rare earth-doped ceria powders derived from oxalate coprecipitate

Sentencas: The oxalate and derived-oxide powders were characterized by XRD, TG-DTA, particle size analyzer with laser diffraction, ICP, TEM and SEM.
Titulo: Characterization of rare earth-doped ceria powders derived from oxalate coprecipitate

Sentencas: The sinterability of oxide powders were also studied at 900 degrees - 1600 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Characterization of rare earth-doped ceria powders derived from oxalate coprecipitate
